subject: Football
Interscholastic Athletics
lead_paragraph: Ted Ginn, a successful Ohio high school football coach and a self-made educator, is fulfilling a vision for at-risk boys at the Ginn Academy he created in Cleveland.
snippet: Ted Ginn, a successful Ohio high school football coach and a self-made educator, is fulfilling a vision for at-risk boys at the Ginn Academy he created in Cleveland.
